tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE policy_monitoring (
  policy_id INT,
  policy_name VARCHAR(255),
  compliance_status ENUM('Compliant', 'Non-Compliant'),
  regulation_type VARCHAR(100),
  land_use_policy VARCHAR(100),
  conservation_initiative VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_monitoring (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_maker_id INT,
    regulation_area VARCHAR(100),
    compliance_status VARCHAR(50),
    inspection_date DATE
    FOREIGN KEY (policy_maker_id) REFERENCES policy_makers(id)
);

CREATE TABLE policy_makers (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  title VARCHAR(255),
  organization VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE agricultural_regulations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  regulation_name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT,
  compliance_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE conservation_initiatives (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  initiative_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE land_use_policies (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  area VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE conservation_initiatives (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  initiative_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE AgriculturalRegulations(
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	regulation_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	description TEXT,
	policy_maker_id INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (policy_maker_id) REFERENCES PolicyMakers(id)
);

CREATE TABLE LandUsePolicies(
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	policy_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	policy_description TEXT,
	policy_maker_id INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (policy_maker_id) REFERENCES PolicyMakers(id)
);

CREATE TABLE ConservationInitiatives(
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	initiative_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	description TEXT,
	policy_maker_id INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (policy_maker_id) REFERENCES PolicyMakers(id)
);

CREATE TABLE ComplianceRecords(
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	record_date DATE,
	policy_id INT,
	status VARCHAR(50),
	policy_type VARCHAR(50),
	FOREIGN KEY (policy_id) REFERENCES AgriculturalRegulations(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);
